docs.snippet: Melons going splat in slow motion. Drawn-as-you-go animation about machines. A behind-the-scenes look at winery operations. Not the usual viral videos, but small business owners have realized offering something to watch and having a sense of humor...
docs.lead_paragraph: Melons going splat in slow motion. Drawn-as-you-go animation about machines. A behind-the-scenes look at winery operations. Not the usual viral videos, but small business owners have realized offering something to watch and having a sense of humor about themselves can help grab customers' attention.

headline.main: Shoot Melons, Kill Bugs: How Businesses Make Creative Videos
headline.print_headline: Shoot Melons, Kill Bugs: How Businesses Make Creative Videos
